_.comment: Text color for danger actions or messages (red.60).

strong.comment: Strong text color for danger actions or messages (red.70).

stronger.comment: Stronger text color for danger actions or messages (red.80).

strongest.comment: Strongest text color for danger actions or messages (red.90).

weak.comment: Weak text color for danger actions or messages (red.40).

weaker.comment: Weaker text color for danger actions or messages (red.20).

weakest.comment: Weakest text color for danger actions or messages (red.10).

strong.comment: Strong text color for decorative purposes (purple.70).

weakest.comment: Weakest text color for info elements (blue.10).
